CreateImage.document: This example shows you how to create an image from the instance "ins-6pb6lrmy". If the instance is running, perform a soft shutdown. If the soft shutdown fails, the task will end (default semantics).
CreateImage.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cvm.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateImage
<Common request parameters>

{
    "InstanceId": "ins-6pb6lrmy",
    "ImageName": "myImage"
}
CreateImage.title: Creating an image

CreateLaunchTemplate.document: This example shows you how to only pass the required parameters such as Zone, image id and launch template ID, while other parameters use system default values. Specific configuration is as follows: The instance location is Guangzhou Zone 2, the image id is img-pmqg1cw7, and the instance launch template name is myTemplate.
CreateLaunchTemplate.title: Use the Simplest Parameters to Create an Instance Launch Template

DeleteDisasterRecoverGroups.title: Deleting a spread placement group

DeleteImages.document: This example shows you how to delete the image `img-34vaef8fe`. If the image is in use or the image ID does not exist, no operation will be performed, and an error code will be returned.
DeleteImages.title: Deleting an image

DeleteImages.document: This example shows you how to delete the image `img-34vaef8fe`. If the image is in use or the image ID does not exist, no operation will be performed and an error code will be returned.
DeleteImages.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cvm.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DeleteImages
<Common request parameters>

{
    "ImageIds": [
        "img-mfih409y"
    ],
    "DryRun": "True",
    "DeleteBindedSnap": "True"
}
DeleteImages.title: Checking whether the specified image can be deleted

DeleteLaunchTemplateVersions.document: This example deletes version 2 and 3 of the instance launch template `lt-34vaef8fe`.
DeleteLaunchTemplateVersions.title: Deletes one or more instance launch template versions

DescribeZones.document: This example shows you how to query information of availability zones in the Guangzhou region. To return its Chinese name of the availability zone, you need to pass the parameter `Language=zh-CN`.

POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cvm.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeZones
X-TC-Language: zh-CN
&<Common request parameters>

{}
DescribeZones.title: Querying the Chinese name of an availability zone

DescribeZones.document: This example shows you how to query the availability zones in the Guangzhou region. Its English name will be returned by default if the parameter `Language` is not passed in.
DescribeZones.title: Querying the English name of an availability zone

ImportImage.document: This example shows you how to import an image.
ImportImage.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cvm.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ImportImage
<Common request parameters>

{
    "ImageUrl": "http://111-1251233127.cosd.myqcloud.com/Windows%20Server%202008%20R2%20x64a.vmdk",
    "ImageDescription": "sampleimage",
    "ImageName": "sample",
    "Architecture": "x86_64",
    "OsType": "CentOS",
    "OsVersion": "6"
}
ImportImage.title: Importing an image

    "PublicKey": "ssh-rsa XXXXXXXXXXXX== skey_45071"
}

InquiryPriceResizeInstanceDisks.document: This example shows you how to query the price for expanding the disk capacity of a pay-as-you-go instance.
InquiryPriceResizeInstanceDisks.title: Querying the price for expanding the disk capacity of a pay-as-you-go instance

InquiryPriceRunInstances.document: This example shows you how to inquire about the price for purchasing 1 instance with the following configurations. Availability zone: Shanghai Zone 2; billing mode: monthly subscription for 1 month, with auto-renewal enabled; image ID: img-pmqg1cw7; model: 64C256G standard (S5.16XLARGE256); system disk: 50 GB premium cloud disk; data disk: 100 GB premium cloud disk; network type: VPC; public network billing: pay-as-you-go by traffic on an hourly basis; public network bandwidth cap: 10 Mbps; public IP address: randomly allocated; instance name: QCLOUD-TEST; login password: Qcloud@TestApi123++; Cloud Monitor: enabled; Cloud Security: enabled.
InquiryPriceRunInstances.title: Inquiring About the Price of a Monthly Subscription Instance

InquiryPriceRunInstances.document: This example shows you how to inquire about the price for purchasing an instance in Shanghai Zone 2 with the image ID `img-pmqg1cw7`. Only the required `Placement.Zone` and `ImageId` parameters are provided. The other parameters use system default values.
InquiryPriceRunInstances.title: Inquiring About the Price of an Instance with Only Required Parameters

InquiryPriceRunInstances.document: This example shows you how to inquire about the price for purchasing 1 instance with the following configurations. Availability zone: Shanghai Zone 2; billing mode: pay-as-you-go on an hourly basis; image ID: img-pmqg1cw7; model: 64C256G standard (S5.16XLARGE256); system disk: 50 GB premium cloud disk; data disk: 100 GB premium cloud disk; network type: VPC; public network billing: pay-as-you-go by traffic on an hourly basis; public network bandwidth cap: 10 Mbps; public IP address: randomly allocated; instance name: QCLOUD-TEST; login password: Qcloud@TestApi123++; Cloud Monitor: enabled; Cloud Security: enabled.
InquiryPriceRunInstances.title: Inquiring About the Price of an Hourly-Billed Pay-as-You-Go Instance

}

RebootInstances.document: This example shows you how to restart two instances.
RebootInstances.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cvm.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: RebootInstances
<Common request parameters>

{
    "StopType": "SOFT",
    "InstanceIds": [
        "ins-5d8a23rs",
        "ins-r8hr2upy"
    ]
}

SyncImages.document: This example shows you how to synchronize the image `img-o3ycss2p` to Guangzhou.
SyncImages.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cvm.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: SyncImages
<Common request parameters>



{
    "ImageIds": [
        "img-o3ycss2p"
    ],
    "DestinationRegions": [
        "ap-guangzhou"
    ],
    "ImageSetRequired": true
}
